main event: A witness observed an arrow-shaped object flashing across the sky at high speed for about 6 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as white and approximately 1 inch long., The sighting took place at night on 25 November 1957., The witness speculated that the object was probably a meteor., No specific individuals were named in the report., The report noted that there was no radar traffic in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: A laborer in Berlin, New Hampshire
